Title: The Baby Was Never Dead
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Erika Harrison, Sarah L. Thompson (executive story editor), Daniel Robinson (story editor), Matthew Cruz (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Rome Flynn
Plot: Annalise and Emmett defend a wealthy CEO accused of killing his business partner; the governor goes after Annalise; Bonnie struggles to accept her budding romance; Asher tries to outmaneuver his old mentor.
